TopicTitle: [1.2.2] Contract Pack: Bases and Stations 3.6.1 (30/04/2017) (formerly Kerbin Space Station)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 17 hours ago, severedsolo said:
> 
> 
> I'll support any issues that arise as a direct result of this update until 7 May 2017 when support will officially end.
> 

I missed something. Are you quitting modding?

> 
> 
> 33 minutes ago, garwel said:
> 
> 
> I missed something. Are you quitting modding?
> 

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/102390-122-contract-pack-bases-and-stations-361-30042017-formerly-kerbin-space-station/&do=embed&comment=3020745&embedComment=3020745&embedDo=findComment"></iframe>

TL:DR - Not quitting modding completely, but dropping the contract packs.

[@severedsolo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/80345-severedsolo/)Thanks for all of your work on this mod (and others).  I've quite enjoyed this contract pack in my current career game.

> 
>

> 
> 
> <iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/102390-122-contract-pack-bases-and-stations-361-30042017-formerly-kerbin-space-station/&do=embed&comment=3020745&embedComment=3020745&embedDo=findComment"></iframe>

That's a shame, but we owe you a lot for your work. Thank you!

> 
> 
> On 5/1/2017 at 8:35 AM, severedsolo said:
> 
> 
> TL:DR - Not quitting modding completely, but dropping the contract packs.
> 

Well, then thank you for making them! I hope somebody will take up this work.
indeed, thank you.

> 
> 
> On 21.03.2015 at 2:40 PM, severedsolo said:
> 
> 
> **Please note that support for B&S will end on 7 May 2017**
> 

Oh.

Now maybe the community could help...

![5j41U2e.png](http://i.imgur.com/5j41U2e.png)

How to do it? I just evacuated the station, but when I try to launch the same rocket again, it doesn't count its name as correct. What should I do then? What is TBD here?

Thanks for your work! Looks fun to play. New challenges ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

But I have one problem with the Stations: It says: "Must have a part unlocked with deployable solar panel"  ...but I have plenty of those parts unlocked. Playing with Ven Stock Revamp, is it incompatible?

> 
> 
> On 6/12/2017 at 6:30 AM, FuzzyHead said:
> 
> 
> Thanks for your work! Looks fun to play. New challenges ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
>

> But I have one problem with the Stations: It says: "Must have a part unlocked with deployable solar panel"  ...but I have plenty of those parts unlocked. Playing with Ven Stock Revamp, is it incompatible?
> 

Heya, I've got the same issue. I don't suppose you've figured out how to fix it have you?

[@FuzzyHead](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/177627-fuzzyhead/), [@LemonSkin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/142318-lemonskin/), I haven't had this problem but I do know that recent Versions of Kopernicus have been altering the stock solar panel module. Do you have Kopernicus?

> 
> 
> 45 minutes ago, Nightside said:
> 
> 
> [@FuzzyHead](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/177627-fuzzyhead/), [@LemonSkin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/142318-lemonskin/), I haven't had this problem but I do know that recent Versions of Kopernicus have been altering the stock solar panel module. Do you have Kopernicus?
> 

I actually just discovered this! I've spent the last 45 mins trying to alter the config file in Bases and Stations to accept the new Kopernicus naming system. I'll upload the file with [@severedsolo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/80345-severedsolo/)'s permission if I can get it working ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Edit: I believe I've fixed it, just waiting on permission, otherwise I'm happy to send the files directly if people PM me.

> 
>

You don't need to ask ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") that's the purpose of the MIT license, you can do what you like with it.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-06-15T14:30:50Z" title="06/15/2017 02:30  PM" data-short="7 yr">June 15, 2017</time> by severedsolo**

In that case, I've posted an unofficial update here:

[https://github.com/LemonSkin/KerbinSpaceStation/releases/tag/3.6.2](https://github.com/LemonSkin/KerbinSpaceStation/releases/tag/3.6.2)

I'll potentially be adding more to this in the future as I absolutely love this mod and don't want to see it disappear from the scene.

Please let me know if any further issues are found or if you have any specific requests and I'll try and make it happen.

Cheers! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
